metadata.purpose: Kernel inputs for CVR_KERNEL_IRR_2.2.5e.py execution in Turn 2

market_data.price_override_note: Live price OVERRIDES State 4 bundle price of $225.00 (stale by 15 days)

fundamentals_y1.note: Y1 fundamentals extracted from State 4 trajectory. Scenario-specific Y1 fundamentals available in scenarios array below.

valuation_anchor.note: IVPS_T1 = IVPS_T0 × (1 + DR) = 206.34 × 1.1325 = 233.68 (intrinsic value compounds at discount rate)

convergence_rate.deviation_rationale: CR below base rate due to regulatory narrative headwind (-0.02 adjustment) and conservative rounding. Implies 4.3-year half-life for convergence (slower than base rate).

multiple_selection.rationale: Mature fintech (28% EBITDA margin, 47% FCF conversion). Market prices profitability on EBITDA multiples.

sse_distribution_reference.note: State 4 distribution statistics from A.10 for reference. Kernel will generate IRR distribution from forks.

capital_allocation_assumption.rationale: DAVE has no dividend policy. FCF retained on balance sheet, reducing net debt (or increasing net cash). Net_Debt_T1 = Net_Debt_T0 - FCF_Y1.

notes: Price T0 of $215.25 is LIVE as of 2025-12-22, overriding State 4 bundle price of $225.00
Market is trading at 1.04x E[IVPS] (215.25 / 206.34 = 1.043), indicating near fair value
Average ρ of 0.25 is conservative; only S1 exceeds 0.30 default
CR of 0.15 below base rate reflects regulatory narrative headwind and lack of positive catalysts
All inputs validated per Phase 0 checklist in IRR Turn 1 protocol
